subclusters.subcluster_name: Senoinflammation: Chronic Inflammation and Metabolic Dysregulation
CMV-Driven Immune Risk Profile and Immunosenescence
Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic Stem Cell Aging and Malignancy

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on immune aging characterized by immunosenescence and chronic low-grade inflammation (inflammaging) with epigenetic regulation and autoimmunity.
Centers on thymic involution causing decline in naive T cell output and immune aging, with genetic and hormonal influences.
Emphasizes genetic control of immune response genes affecting lifespan and immune function.
Describes cellular-level immune aging including T cell dysfunction, thymic involution, stem cell aging, and systemic factors.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Arachidonic Acid Metabolism and Inflammation Resolution Imbalance
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on imbalance of pro- and anti-inflammatory lipid mediators from arachidonic acid metabolism driving chronic inflammation in aging.
Describes shift from adaptive to innate immunity and chronic inflammation as drivers of systemic aging.
Focuses on NLRP3 inflammasome activation by metabolic and mitochondrial dysfunction as a key driver of inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammatory Host Response and Life History Regulation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains inflammatory host response as an evolutionary regulator of life history trade-offs between fertility and maintenance.
Details thymic involution and peripheral naive T cell maintenance decline as causes of immunosenescence.
Attributes thymic involution primarily to intrinsic proliferative decline of thymic epithelial cells.
Describes thymic involution, hematopoietic stem cell aging, and T cell replicative senescence as mechanisms of immune aging.
Links chronic inflammation induced by energy accumulation to metabolic regulation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senoinflammation: Chronic Inflammation and Metabolic Dysregulation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Defines senoinflammation as chronic low-grade inflammation driven by senescent cells and metabolic dysfunction.
Focuses on chronic inflammation and NF-κB activation causing endothelial dysfunction and vascular aging.
Details thymic involution and compensatory peripheral T cell proliferation leading to immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: CMV-Driven Immune Risk Profile and Immunosenescence
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links persistent CMV infection to immune risk profile, T cell clonal expansions, and systemic immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: CMV-Driven Immune Risk Profile and Immunosenescence
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes chronic CMV antigenic stress causing CD8+ T cell clonal expansions and immune aging.
Focuses on TLR4 genetic variants modulating inflammatory responses and influencing aging and age-related diseases.
Describes interplay of immunosenescence and inflammaging driving neurodegeneration and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation and Immune Modulation in Delayed Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows altered immune gene expression and reduced inflammation contributing to delayed aging in Ames dwarf mice.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Mortality in Natural Populations
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links immune decline against parasites to increased mortality, highlighting immunosenescence as causal in aging.
Proposes thymic involution as a pacemaker of aging via autoimmune processes and pineal-thymus regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Dysfunction as a Driver of Systemic Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Attributes early immune decline and genetic/environmental modulation to systemic aging acceleration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senoinflammation: Chronic Inflammation and Metabolic Dysregulation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senoinflammation involving SASP, immune dysregulation, and key inflammatory signaling pathways.
Details thymic involution, B and innate immune cell defects, and ROS in immune aging.
Links chronic inflammation driven by innate immune signaling to metabolic dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senoinflammation: Chronic Inflammation and Metabolic Dysregulation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Integrates immune, metabolic, and redox signaling in chronic inflammation driving aging, modulated by calorie restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic Stem Cell Aging and Malignancy
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on inflammation-induced HSC functional decline, mutagenesis, and clonal hematopoiesis driving aging and cancer.
Describes chronic inflammation and NF-κB activation causing endothelial dysfunction and vascular aging.
Focuses on antibody repertoire changes, somatic hypermutation, and autoantibody-driven chronic inflammation accelerating aging.
Describes adaptive immune decline and inflammaging as key contributors to aging and mortality.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Unresolved Inflammation and Immune Dysregulation in Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on imbalance of inflammatory responses ('Yin-Yang'), immune pleiotropy, and tissue integrity erosion driving aging.
Links chronic inflammatory ROS damage and transcriptional infidelity to endothelial senescence and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Hematopoietic Stem Cell Aging and Malignancy
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammation-induced irreversible HSC exhaustion and accelerated hematopoietic aging.
